name: tezos_starrynight_06_08_2021
description:
This is a generative art piece created from all of the transactions completed on August 6th 2021, the date of the Granada network upgrade, on the Tezos mainnet.

This style is called "Starry Night". Each pixel that is not the background color, #00000A in this piece, represents a unique address that participated in these transactions.

For the first frame of the GIF, the pixels are colored based on how many transactions they participated in during the chosen day. A more active address is shown as a brighter star. Thereafter, randomly chosen pixels have their brightness altered to create the twinkling effect.
